title: ISldWorks.IGetMaterialDatabases
description: Gets the names of the material databases.
returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to the an array of the names of the material databases VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Before calling this method, call
ISldWorks::GetMaterialDatabaseCount
to get the value for Count.
Material database names must be unique. Do not re-use the name of a material database.
